name: Eggggg - The platform puker
description: Eggggg is a ridiculous two-button platform game where you propel yourself around using your vomiting superpowers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual Core 4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory Storage: 1 GB available space
